mapper.select: select * from t_cms_info where ID=#{id} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'

select ID as "id" , TAG_LIST as "tagList" , UUID as "uuid" , INFO_GRAB_ID as "infoGrabId" , CHANNEL_ID as "channelId" , TITLE as "title" , SHORT_TITLE as "shortTitle" , GENERAL as "general" , ORIGIN as "origin" , ORIGIN_URL as "originUrl" , AUTHOR as "author" , INFORMATION_TYPE as "informationType" , SELECTED_ENDTIME as "selectedEndtime" , STICK as "stick" , STICK_EDNTIME as "stickEdntime" , HAS_TITLE_IMG as "hasTitleImg" , RECOMMEND_FLAG as "recommendFlag" , STATUS as "status" , BROWSE_COUNT as "browseCount" , COMMENT_COUNT as "commentCount" , SHARE_COUNT as "shareCount" , COLLECTION_COUNT as "collectionCount" , FABULOUS_COUNT as "fabulousCount" , TRAMPLE_COUNT as "trampleCount" , DESCRIPTION as "description" , VALID_BEGIN as "validBegin" , VALID_END as "validEnd" , VOID_PATH as "voidPath" , DISPLAY_MODE as "displayMode" , BIZ_ID as "bizId" , ARTICLE_TYPE as "articleType" , PROBATION_FLAG as "probationFlag" , IS_SHOW_GENERAL as "isShowGeneral" , IS_SHOW_ORIGIN as "isShowOrigin" , IS_SHOW_COPYRIGHT as "isShowCopyright" , IS_SHOW_DISCLAIMER as "isShowDisclaimer" , IS_SHOW_AUTHOR as "isShowAuthor" , RELEASE_ID as "releaseId" , RELEASE_DATE as "releaseDate" , REVIEWER_ID as "reviewerId" , REVIEWER as "reviewer" , AUDIT_TIME as "auditTime" , REVOKE_ID as "revokeId" , REVOKER as "revoker" , REVOKE_TIME as "revokeTime" , RESUFE_REMARK as "resufeRemark" , CREATE_USER as "createUser" , CREATE_DATE as "createDate" , UPDATE_USER as "updateUser" , UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate" , ALIVE_FLAG as "aliveFlag" , EXTEND1 as "extend1" , EXTEND2 as "extend2" , EXTEND3 as "extend3" , EXTEND4 as "extend4" , EXTEND5 as "extend5" , EXTEND6 as "extend6" , EXTEND7 as "extend7" , EXTEND8 as "extend8" , EXTEND9 as "extend9" , EXTEND10 as "extend10" from t_cms_info where UUID=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'

select ID as "id" , UUID as "uuid" , INFO_GRAB_ID as "infoGrabId" , CHANNEL_ID as "channelId" , TITLE as "title" , SHORT_TITLE as "shortTitle" , GENERAL as "general" , ORIGIN as "origin" , ORIGIN_URL as "originUrl" , AUTHOR as "author" , INFORMATION_TYPE as "informationType" , SELECTED_ENDTIME as "selectedEndtime" , STICK as "stick" , STICK_EDNTIME as "stickEdntime" , HAS_TITLE_IMG as "hasTitleImg" , RECOMMEND_FLAG as "recommendFlag" , STATUS as "status" , BROWSE_COUNT as "browseCount" , COMMENT_COUNT as "commentCount" , SHARE_COUNT as "shareCount" , COLLECTION_COUNT as "collectionCount" , FABULOUS_COUNT as "fabulousCount" , TRAMPLE_COUNT as "trampleCount" , DESCRIPTION as "description" , VALID_BEGIN as "validBegin" , VALID_END as "validEnd" , VOID_PATH as "voidPath" , DISPLAY_MODE as "displayMode" , BIZ_ID as "bizId" , ARTICLE_TYPE as "articleType" , PROBATION_FLAG as "probationFlag" , IS_SHOW_GENERAL as "isShowGeneral" , IS_SHOW_ORIGIN as "isShowOrigin" , IS_SHOW_COPYRIGHT as "isShowCopyright" , IS_SHOW_DISCLAIMER as "isShowDisclaimer" , IS_SHOW_AUTHOR as "isShowAuthor" , RELEASE_ID as "releaseId" , RELEASE_DATE as "releaseDate" , REVIEWER_ID as "reviewerId" , REVIEWER as "reviewer" , AUDIT_TIME as "auditTime" , REVOKE_ID as "revokeId" , REVOKER as "revoker" , REVOKE_TIME as "revokeTime" , RESUFE_REMARK as "resufeRemark" , CREATE_USER as "createUser" , CREATE_DATE as "createDate" , UPDATE_USER as "updateUser" , UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate" , ALIVE_FLAG as "aliveFlag" , EXTEND1 as "extend1" , EXTEND2 as "extend2" , EXTEND3 as "extend3" , EXTEND4 as "extend4" , EXTEND5 as "extend5" , EXTEND6 as "extend6" , EXTEND7 as "extend7" , EXTEND8 as "extend8" , EXTEND9 as "extend9" , EXTEND10 as "extend10" from t_cms_info where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and CHANNEL_ID = -1
and DATE_FORMAT(RELEASE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{validBegin},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(RELEASE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{validEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
and STATUS = #{status} order by id DESC
mapper.update: update t_cms_info SET STATUS = '30' where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and UUID = #{uuid}
mapper.select: select ID as "id" , UUID as "uuid" , INFO_GRAB_ID as "infoGrabId" , CHANNEL_ID as "channelId" , TITLE as "title" , SHORT_TITLE as "shortTitle" , GENERAL as "general" , ORIGIN as "origin" , ORIGIN_URL as "originUrl" , AUTHOR as "author" , INFORMATION_TYPE as "informationType" , date_format(SELECTED_ENDTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as "selectedEndtime" , STICK as "stick" , date_format(STICK_EDNTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as "stickEdntime" , HAS_TITLE_IMG as "hasTitleImg" , RECOMMEND_FLAG as "recommendFlag" , STATUS as "status" , BROWSE_COUNT as "browseCount" , COMMENT_COUNT as "commentCount" , SHARE_COUNT as "shareCount" , COLLECTION_COUNT as "collectionCount" , FABULOUS_COUNT as "fabulousCount" , TRAMPLE_COUNT as "trampleCount" , DESCRIPTION as "description" , date_format(VALID_BEGIN, '%Y-%m-%d') as "validBegin" , date_format(VALID_END, '%Y-%m-%d') as "validEnd" , VOID_PATH as "voidPath" , DISPLAY_MODE as "displayMode" , BIZ_ID as "bizId" , ARTICLE_TYPE as "articleType" , PROBATION_FLAG as "probationFlag" , IS_SHOW_GENERAL as "isShowGeneral" , IS_SHOW_ORIGIN as "isShowOrigin" , IS_SHOW_COPYRIGHT as "isShowCopyright" , IS_SHOW_DISCLAIMER as "isShowDisclaimer" , IS_SHOW_AUTHOR as "isShowAuthor" , RELEASE_ID as "releaseId" , date_format(RELEASE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as "releaseDate" , REVIEWER_ID as "reviewerId" , REVIEWER as "reviewer" , date_format(AUDIT_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') as "auditTime" , REVOKE_ID as "revokeId" , REVOKER as "revoker" , date_format(REVOKE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') as "revokeTime" , RESUFE_REMARK as "resufeRemark" , TAG_LIST as "tagList" , CREATE_USER as "createUser" , date_format(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as "createDate" , UPDATE_USER as "updateUser" , date_format(UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as "updateDate" , ALIVE_FLAG as "aliveFlag" , EXTEND1 as "extend1" , EXTEND2 as "extend2" , EXTEND3 as "extend3" , EXTEND4 as "extend4" , EXTEND5 as "extend5" , EXTEND6 as "extend6" , EXTEND7 as "extend7" , EXTEND8 as "extend8" , EXTEND9 as "extend9" , EXTEND10 as "extend10" from t_cms_info where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and (STATUS = '00' or STATUS = '20' or STATUS = '29') and CREATE_USER = #{createUser}
select id,STICK,uuid from t_cms_info where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and STATUS='30' /** STATUS 30 已发布状态*/ and STICK='1' and CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId}

select tci.ID as "id" , tci.TAG_LIST as "tagList" , tci.UUID as "uuid" , tci.INFO_GRAB_ID as "infoGrabId" , tci.CHANNEL_ID as "channelId" , tci.TITLE as "title" , tci.SHORT_TITLE as "shortTitle" , tci.GENERAL as "general" , tci.ORIGIN as "origin" , tci.ORIGIN_URL as "originUrl" , tci.AUTHOR as "author" , tci.INFORMATION_TYPE as "informationType" , tci.SELECTED_ENDTIME as "selectedEndtime" , tci.STICK as "stick" , tci.STICK_EDNTIME as "stickEdntime" , tci.HAS_TITLE_IMG as "hasTitleImg" , tci.RECOMMEND_FLAG as "recommendFlag" , tci.STATUS as "status" , tci.BROWSE_COUNT as "browseCount" , tci.COMMENT_COUNT as "commentCount" , tci.SHARE_COUNT as "shareCount" , tci.COLLECTION_COUNT as "collectionCount" , tci.FABULOUS_COUNT as "fabulousCount" , tci.TRAMPLE_COUNT as "trampleCount" , tci.DESCRIPTION as "description" , tci.VALID_BEGIN as "validBegin" , tci.VALID_END as "validEnd" , tci.VOID_PATH as "voidPath" , tci.DISPLAY_MODE as "displayMode" , tci.BIZ_ID as "bizId" , tci.ARTICLE_TYPE as "articleType" , tci.PROBATION_FLAG as "probationFlag" , tci.IS_SHOW_GENERAL as "isShowGeneral" , tci.IS_SHOW_ORIGIN as "isShowOrigin" , tci.IS_SHOW_COPYRIGHT as "isShowCopyright" , tci.IS_SHOW_DISCLAIMER as "isShowDisclaimer" , tci.IS_SHOW_AUTHOR as "isShowAuthor" , tci.RELEASE_ID as "releaseId" , date_format(tci.RELEASE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as "releaseDate" , tci.REVIEWER_ID as "reviewerId" , tci.REVIEWER as "reviewer" , tci.AUDIT_TIME as "auditTime" , tci.REVOKE_ID as "revokeId" , tci.REVOKER as "revoker" , tci.REVOKE_TIME as "revokeTime" , tci.RESUFE_REMARK as "resufeRemark" , tci.CREATE_USER as "createUser" , tci.CREATE_DATE as "createDate" , tci.UPDATE_USER as "updateUser" , tci.UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate" , tci.ALIVE_FLAG as "aliveFlag" , tci.EXTEND1 as "extend1" , tci.EXTEND2 as "extend2" , tci.EXTEND3 as "extend3" , tci.EXTEND4 as "extend4" , tci.EXTEND5 as "extend5" , tci.EXTEND6 as "extend6" , tci.EXTEND7 as "extend7" , tci.EXTEND8 as "extend8" , tci.EXTEND9 as "extend9" , tci.EXTEND10 as "extend10" , tcic.TEX as "tex" , tcic.TEX_HTML as "texHtml" from t_cms_info tci left join t_cms_info_content tcic on tci.ID = tcic.INFO_ID where tci.UUID=#{uuid} and tci.ALIVE_FLAG='1'

SELECT t.UUID AS "preUuid", t.TITLE AS "preTitle" FROM t_cms_info t WHERE t.alive_flag = '1' and t.channel_id = #{channelId} and DATE_FORMAT(t.RELEASE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < #{releaseDate} ORDER BY t.RELEASE_DATE DESC limit 0, 1

SELECT t.UUID AS "nextUuid", t.TITLE AS "nextTitle" FROM t_cms_info t WHERE t.alive_flag = '1' and t.channel_id = #{channelId} and DATE_FORMAT(t.RELEASE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') > #{releaseDate} ORDER BY t.RELEASE_DATE asc limit 0, 1
SELECT MAX(INFO_GRAB_ID+0) FROM `t_cms_info` WHERE ALIVE_FLAG='1' AND ORIGIN = '金凯讯' AND EXTEND2 = #{typ}
select * from t_cms_info where ID = #{objId}

select i.UUID as "uuid", i.ID as "infoId", i.RELEASE_DATE as "releaseDate", i.AUTHOR as "author", i.BROWSE_COUNT as "browseCount", i.TITLE as "title", i.IS_SHOW_COPYRIGHT as "isShowCopyright", i.COLLECTION_COUNT as "collectionCount", i.FABULOUS_COUNT as "fabulousCount", i.EXTEND1 as "extend1", ic.TEX as "tex", ic.TEX_HTML as "texHtml", cc.ID as "id", cc.COLUMN_TITLE as "columnTitle", cc.COLUMN_CLASSIFY_NAME as "columnClassifyName", cc.COLUMN_COVER as "columnCover" from t_cms_info_content ic inner join t_cms_info i on i.ID = ic.INFO_ID inner join t_col_column cc on i.BIZ_ID = cc.ID where i.UUID = #{infoUuid} AND i.ALIVE_FLAG='1'

select i.UUID as "uuid", i.RELEASE_DATE as "releaseDate", i.AUTHOR as "author", i.BROWSE_COUNT as "browseCount", i.TITLE as "title", i.IS_SHOW_COPYRIGHT as "isShowCopyright", i.COLLECTION_COUNT as "collectionCount", i.FABULOUS_COUNT as "fabulousCount", ic.TEX as "tex", ic.TEX_HTML as "texHtml" from t_cms_info_content ic inner join t_cms_info i on i.ID = ic.INFO_ID INNER JOIN t_col_column cc on i.BIZ_ID = cc.ID where i.ALIVE_FLAG='1' order by i.BROWSE_COUNT DESC limit 10

select i.RELEASE_DATE AS releaseDate, c.TEX AS tex, i.TITLE AS title, i.UUID AS uuid, i.AUTHOR AS author, i.BROWSE_COUNT AS browseCount, i.EXTEND1 AS extend1, i.GENERAL AS general, i.FABULOUS_COUNT AS fabulousCount, i.COLLECTION_COUNT AS collectionCount from t_cms_info i, t_cms_info_content c where i.id = c.INFO_ID AND i.ALIVE_FLAG='1' AND i.BIZ_ID = #{bizId} AND i.STATUS = #{status} AND i.ARTICLE_TYPE = #{articleType} ORDER BY i.RELEASE_DATE DESC
select * from t_cms_info where BIZ_ID = #{id} AND ALIVE_FLAG='1' order by RELEASE_DATE DESC limit 3
